title: Ogre Gun Smoke, oneshot
description:
There's a legendary killer stalking the street whose name comes from a monster of our nightmares, one that emerges from the shadows to feast on the evil-doers. And tonight, he has his sights on a gangster who has a trick up his sleeves tooâ€¦

Oneshot that was originally published on Young Animal magazine (2018). That print version is slightly different from the raw posted on the author's twitter.
author: Nujima
